altername_name: Alien Research Centre III: Footprints in the Snow
name: Alien Research Centre III
overview: The game is loosely (very loosely) based on 'Alien Research Centre 1 and 2. Initially created for the ZX Spectrum using the PunyInform platform which can create text adventures for multiple platforms. It was released as part of the "Pack of Three" multi-platform compilation. Introduction: Last night's snowfall was heavy and as you enter the study you cannot help but notice the layers of snow on the frame and ledge of the window...
